EmailTemplate.description: Email sent to BOMs as a reminder to submit the lien payout statement to accounting on a trade ERP with active lien.
EmailTemplate.name: Notify BOM to Submit Lien Payout Statement
EmailTemplate.subject: Submit Lien Payout Statement to Accounting
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Howdy!
This is a reminder to send accounting the lien payout statement for the following Trade-In ERP:
{!AcctSeed__Project__c.Link}
Keep up the great work!
